document_data.mainbody: 'Ovon''' was a monk of the [[Monastery of the Yellow Rose]] in the [[Earthspur Mountains]].
document_data.Personality: Ovon was always calm and naive. He was a pacifist and never acted to harm someone. Ovon tended to be enigmatic and spoke in riddles.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], he met and befriended [[Thylius Caramitru]], who'd visited the Monastery. Thylius invited him to his house in [[Mulmaster]] and Ovon accepted. However, once in Mulmaster, Thylius enslaved Ovon and forced him to teach him the secret of [[Yellow Breath]]. He remained a prisoner of Thylius in the [[Yellow Breath Chapter House]] until an adventuring party hired to find missing young nobles freed him.{{Cite adventurers league/Eye of the Tempest|11}}
